A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Loved it. Had some humor added with the seriousness of the movie. Glad to see they let Mark Hamill’s personality come through in this one. I know people want “their” theories confirmed\, but I’m glad they didn’t do what fans wanted with this. If Rey’s parents are really no bodies\, it shows that anyone can be special and it’s not just a movie series about a family drama like Lucas wanted it.
